detaileddescription.para: Read the EMMC temperature.

This function is used to get ADC value for AI_TEMP_SENSOR_EMMC - ADC_CHANNEL_1.
To be called after HAL_SetActiveConfigSet
N/A
void
raw ADC value
Globals
N/a
reentrant No context task context GW_Conti_MV - GW_Read_Measure_Values_0xEFE6 TharmalMgr - CalculateICAS1TemperatureState thread safe No - Integration must insure that that function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module multicore safe No synchronous N/a
Call Sequence
Test Method
The testing method is described on: Test case shall be created to check the ADC value pf EMMC temperature. TEST_EMMC_Temp_Channel Traceability
Design Decision - Justification. Needed by CalculateICAS1TemperatureState to implement {SWR_ICAS1_GW_9552}.
Read the Chorus temperature.

This function is used to get ADC value for AI_TEMP_SENSOR - ADC_CHANNEL_0.
To be called after HAL_SetActiveConfigSet.
N/A
void
raw ADC value
Globals
N/a
reentrant No context task context GW_Conti_MV - GW_Read_Measure_Values_0xEFE5 TharmalMgr - CalculateICAS1TemperatureState VoltagePlausibilityCheck - VoltagePlausibilityCheck_EOL_Calibration thread safe No - Integration must insure that that function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module multicore safe No synchronous N/a
Call Sequence
Test Method
The testing method is described on: Test case shall be created to check the ADC value of Chorus temperature. TEST_External_Temp_Gateway_Channel Traceability
Design Decision - Justification. Needed by CalculateICAS1TemperatureState to implement {SWR_ICAS1_GW_12052}.
Check if a new wakeup was detected on Ethernet and clear wakeup bit.

This function check if there is a new wakeup event and clear it for WAKEUP_OBD - WAKEUP_PIN_0.
To be called after HAL_SetActiveConfigSet
N/A
void
TRUE if wakeup was detected FALSE no wakeup was detected
Globals
N/a
reentrant No context task context WakeupSleep - doBusRxWakeupHandling and doReadyForPowerDown thread safe No - Integration must insure that that function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module multicore safe No synchronous N/a
Call Sequence
Test Method
The testing method is described on: Test case shall be created to check if there is or not any wakeup event. TEST_HalWakeupIsOBD Traceability
Design Decision - Justification. Helper function to check the wakeup for a configured pin.
Check if a new wakeup was detected on AFS CAN and clear wakeup bit.

This function check if a CAN wakeup was detected by the HW wakeup unit for the coresponding Channel and clear the HW wakeup bit.
To be called after HAL_SetActiveConfigSet
N/A
void
TRUE if wakeup was detected FALSE no wakeup was detected
Globals
_MEB_AFSCAN [in]
reentrant No context task context WakeupSleep - doBusRxWakeupHandling thread safe No - Integration must insure that that function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module multicore safe No synchronous To check and modify on the channel for AFS CAN, the function use _MEB_AFSCAN.
Call Sequence
Test Method
The testing method is described on: Test case shall be created to check if there is or not any wakeup event on AFS CAN and if the function clear the weakeup bit. TEST_HalWakeupIsAFSCAN Traceability
Satisfies requirement
SWR_ICAS1_GW_19869

Check if a new wakeup was detected on LIN4 and clear wakeup bit.

This function check if a LIN wakeup was detected by the HW wakeup unit for the coresponding Channel and clear the HW wakeup bit.
To be called after HAL_SetActiveConfigSet
N/A
void
TRUE if wakeup was detected FALSE no wakeup was detected
Globals
_Lin4 [in]
reentrant No context task context LowPower_Main - Lpw_SplitOnLowPower thread safe No - Integration must insure that that function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module multicore safe No synchronous To check and modify on the channel for LIN4, the function use _Lin4.
Call Sequence
Test Method
The testing method is described on: Test case shall be created to check if there is or not any wakeup event on LIN4 CAN and if the function clear the weakeup bit. TEST_Hal_Lin4WakeupBit_Value Traceability
Design Decision - Justification. Helper function needed by Lpw_SplitOnLowPower.

To be called after HAL_SetActiveConfigSet

void
void

This function set 256 kbytes Ram and clear all wakeups.
To be called after HAL_SetActiveConfigSet
N/A
void
void
Globals
MC_PCU_PCONF_STANDBY
reentrant No context task context PostBuildHandler - PostBuildHandler_McalInit thread safe No - Integration must insure that that function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module multicore safe No synchronous MC_PCU_PCONF_STANDBY is used to set the pointer to the "MC_PCU" (Power Control Unit) peripheral on standby (0x25ffuL).
Call Sequence
Test Method
The testing method is described on: Test case shall be created to check if the wakeup is set correctly and the wakeups are cleared TEST_HAL_InitWakeupUnitSleep Traceability

Store the wakeup bits and then clear the wakeup source register.

Store the wakeup bits in WakeupSrc and Msg_KN_Gateway_diag then clear the wakeup source register. Bits are cleared by writing 1.
N/A
N/A
void
void
Globals
WakeupSrc [out]
reentrant No context task context bstartrtsw - main_Core2 thread safe No - Integration must insure that that function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module multicore safe No synchronous WakeupSrc is used to store (write) the wakeup bits and to clear the wakeup source register.
Call Sequence
Test Method
The testing method is described on: Test case shall be created to check if the wakeup bits are stored correctly and if the clear of the wakeup source register has been done. TEST_GetWakeupSrc Traceability
Design Decision - Justification. The wakeup information is saved in a RAM image to void loosing the information during initialization and in buffer Msg_KN_Gateway_diag fo diagnosis.
Get all valid wakeup bits.

This function is used to return all valid wakeup bits.
N/A
N/A
nr
- index for HAL Config Set Type range uint8 resolution N/A unit N/A
uint32 - wakeup bits
Globals
HAL_active_config_set [in] valid_wakeups_bit_mask [in]
reentrant No context task context HAL_VARIANT - Hal_Lpw_EnableWakeupSources HalIsLowPowerToHighPowerWakeup HalIsLowPowerWakeup HAL_WakeupUnit_Init Board_WakeupBits_ClearAll thread safe No - Integration must insure that that function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module multicore safe No synchronous Active HAL config set depending on the HW version and access the data value of valid_wakeups_bit_mask.
Call Sequence
Test Method
The testing method is described on: Test case shall be created to check if we get all valid wakeup bits. TEST_HAL_WakeupBits_AllValidBits Traceability
Design Decision - Justification. Helper function needed by all context functions.
Clear WakeupSrc.

This function is used to Clear WakeupSrc.
N/A
N/A
void
void
Globals
WakeupSrc [out]
reentrant No context task context SystemControl - OS_TASK_SystemControlTask thread safe No - Integration must insure that that function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module multicore safe No synchronous This function set WakeupSrc wakeup bits to 0.
Call Sequence
Test Method
The testing method is described on: Test case shall be created to check if WakeupSrc is cleared (set to 0). TEST_ClearWakeupSrc Traceability
Design Decision - Justification. Clear the wakeup information that is saved in a RAM image to void loosing the information.
Activate the digital pin WAKEUP_GW2WD (used by RL78).

This function activate the pin WAKEUP_GW2WD. To be active the pin WAKEUP_GW2WD needs to be low.
To be called after HAL_SetActiveConfigSet
N/A
void
void
Globals
PORT_PIN_LEVEL_LOW [in]
reentrant No context task context SystemControl - OS_TASK_SystemControlTask thread safe No - Integration must insure that that function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module multicore safe No synchronous WAKEUP_GW2WD is active if WAKEUP_GW2WD is low.
Call Sequence
Test Method
The testing method is described on: Test case shall be created to check if the function activate pin WAKEUP_GW2WD. TEST_HAL_activate_WAKEUP_GW2WD Traceability
Design Decision - Justification. Needed by OS_TASK_SystemControlTask to implement {SWR_ICAS1_GW_16101}.
Deactivate the digital pin WAKEUP_GW2WD (used by RL78).

This function deactivate the pin WAKEUP_GW2WD. To be deactive the pin WAKEUP_GW2WD needs to be high.
To be called after HAL_SetActiveConfigSet
N/A
void
void
Globals
PORT_PIN_LEVEL_HIGH [in]
reentrant No context task context SystemControl - OS_TASK_SystemControlTask thread safe No - Integration must insure that that function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module multicore safe No synchronous WAKEUP_GW2WD is deactive if WAKEUP_GW2WD is high.
Call Sequence
Test Method
The testing method is described on: Test case shall be created to check if the function deactivate pin WAKEUP_GW2WD. TEST_HAL_deactivate_WAKEUP_GW2WD Traceability
Design Decision - Justification. Needed by OS_TASK_SystemControlTask to implement {SWR_ICAS1_GW_16102}.
Sets the pointer HAL_active_config_set to the valid HAL_config_set.

Sets the pointer HAL_active_config_set to the valid HAL_config_set depending on the Hardware variant. The used components and interfaces are defined in hal_cfg.xml.
N/A
N/A
hwVersion
- Board version range HardwareVersionType resolution N/A unit N/A
void
Globals
HAL_active_config_set [out]
reentrant No context task context PostBuildHendler - PostBuildHandler_McalInit_LIN4_DWA_mode and PostBuildHandler_McalInit thread safe No - Integration must insure that that function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module multicore safe No synchronous Sets the pointer HAL_active_config_set to the valid HAL_config_set depending on the Hardware variant. For example if hwVersion is VW_MEB19_ICAS1_B1: HAL_active_config_set=&HAL_config_set[_PortConfigSet_B1_AdcConfigSet_B1];
Call Sequence
Test Method
The testing method is described on: Test case shall be created to check if the pointer HAL_active_config_set is set correctly. TEST_HAL_SetActiveConfigSet Traceability
Satisfies requirement
SWR_ICAS1_GW_9711 Design Decision - Justification. The HAL configuration is dependent on the HW version and needs to be updated at startup.
Clear a possible wakeup for diagnose CAN.

This function check if a CAN or LIN wakeup was detected by the HW wakeup unit for the coresponding Channel and clear the HW wakeup bit.
To be called after HAL_SetActiveConfigSet
N/A
void
void
Globals
_MEB_DiagCANFD [in]
reentrant No context task context BusMonitorConfig - ApplNmCanSleep thread safe No - Integration must insure that that function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module multicore safe No synchronous _MEB_DiagCANFD is used for communication channel 2.
Call Sequence
Test Method
The testing method is described on: Test case shall be created to check if the the possible wakeup for diagnose CAN is cleared. TEST_HalClearDiagnosisWakeup Traceability
Design Decision - Justification. Needed by BusMonitor to clear a wakeup event.
This routine returns the whether the ETH_WAKEUP is active.

This function is used to check if wakeup is active (to be active it needs DI_ETH_WAKEUP to be low*) and to return the status.
To be called after HAL_SetActiveConfigSet
N/A
void
TRUE if wakeup is active FALSE otherwise
Globals
PORT_PIN_LEVEL_LOW [in]
reentrant No context task context WakeupSleep - updateInternalWUPReasons thread safe No - Integration must insure that that function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module multicore safe No synchronous The OBD is active if DI_ETH_WAKEUP is low (PORT_PIN_LEVEL_LOW).
Call Sequence
Test Method
The testing method is described on: Test case shall be created to check the status of wakeup for both conditions (DI_ETH_WAKEUP equal to LOW and DI_ETH_WAKEUP not equal to LOW). TEST_HalWakeupOBDActive Traceability
Satisfies requirement
SWR_ICAS1_GW_18948
Check whether only a wakeup from the internal RTC is active.

This function is used to check whether only a wakeup from the internal RTC is active and to return the status (if it is active or not).
N/A
N/A
void
TRUE if a RTC wakeup is active FALSE otherwise
Globals
WakeupSrc [in] INTERNAL_RTC_WKP_MASK [in]
reentrant No context task context LowPower_Main - Lpw_SplitOnLowPower thread safe No - Integration must insure that that function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module multicore safe No synchronous WakeupSrc is used to check the wakeup bits. INTERNAL_RTC_WKP_MASK - RTC_INT used the last 2 bits from the WKPU. In this function is used to check whether only a wakeup from the internal RTC is active.
Call Sequence
Test Method
The testing method is described on: Test case shall be created to check the value of retVal according to each case. TEST_HalIsLowPowerWakeup Traceability
Design Decision - Justification. Helper function to check if the system should stay in low power (RTC_DWA mode). Needed by Lpw_SplitOnLowPower to implement {SWR_ICAS1_GW_11145}.
Enable the wakeup reasons from low power (including RTC_API) for low power DWA.

This function is used to enable the wakeup reasons from low power (including RTC_API) for low power DWA by clearing last 2 bits of **WKPU[0].WISR, enabling Rising-Edge Event and enabling Wakeup Bits.
N/A
N/A
void
void
Globals
INTERNAL_RTC_WKP_MASK [in]
reentrant No context task context LowPower_HAL - Hal_LpTimer_EnableWakeup thread safe No - Integration must insure that that function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module multicore safe No synchronous RTC_INT used the last 2 bits from the WKPU.
Call Sequence
Test Method
The testing method is described on: Test case shall be created to check if the wakeup reasons are enabled. TEST_Hal_Lpw_EnableWakeupSources Traceability
Satisfies requirement
SWR_ICAS1_GW_18931
SWR_ICAS1_GW_19869
Get device pointer.

Return the FlexLin device pointer coresponding to the DWA LIN.
N/A
N/A
void
pointer to the DWA LIN peripheral
Globals
N/A
reentrant No context task context DWA_LowPower - Lpw_Poll_Lin_Interrupts thread safe No - Integration must insure that that function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module multicore safe No synchronous N/A
Call Sequence
Test Method
The testing method is described on: Test case shall be created to check if the function returns the FlexLin device pointer coresponding to the DWA LIN. TEST_HAL_DWA_LIN_GetDevicePtr Traceability
Design Decision - Justification. Needed by RTC_DWA to access the status flags in low power when interrupts are not enabled.
Configure ports for sleep.

This function is used to configure ports for sleep. It set the standby-pin to standby, set digital value for DO_ENABLE_KL30_DIAGNOSE to low, clear the wakeup bits, check if NvM data stored in Standby RAM is valid mark core1, core0 and HSM as inactive for the next Mcu mode transition, set LIN2 and LIN3 transceivers to sleep mode, set CAN or LIN transceiver to sleep mode, disable all pad keepers and set digital value for GW2WD_LOWPOWER - GPIO_7 to low.
To be called after #HAL_SetActiveConfigSe
The ECU needs to go to sleep
void
void
Globals
DWA_LIN_MAX_SHUTDOWN_TIME_MS [in] _Diag, _ComChannelLinFirst, _ComChannelLinLast [in] PORT_PIN_LEVEL_LOW [in] SCR0 [out]
reentrant No context task context No thread safe No - Integration must insure that that function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module multicore safe No synchronous DWA_LIN_MAX_SHUTDOWN_TIME_MS - used to set a block time. _Diag, _ComChannelLinFirst, _ComChannelLinLast - used to set ComChannel to normal mode and sleep mode. PORT_PIN_LEVEL_LOW - used to set digital value for DO_ENABLE_KL30_DIAGNOSE - GPIO_2 and GW2WD_LOWPOWER - GPIO_7 on low
Call Sequence
Test Method
The testing method is described on: Test case shall be created to check if the ports are configured for sleep. TEST_HAL_Prepare_Ports_ForSleepMode Traceability
Satisfies requirement
SWR_ICAS1_GW_18926
SWR_ICAS1_GW_19691

briefdescription.para: Provides declaration of functions that need low level access specific to one Chorus uC variant.
